# TODO
- za cas $\Delta t$ narastie $\Delta I$
- ak rqastie I, rastie aj E -> o \(\Delta E_m\)
- el. sily konaju pracu

\(W = \Delta E_m = P \times \Delta t = \) \
= \(U_i \times I \times \Delta t = \) \
= \(U_i = L \times \frac{\Delta I}{\Delta t}\) \
= \(\Delta E = \Sigma \times \Delta I\) \
\(\Sigma = L \times I\) \ 
\(E = \frac{1}{2} \times L \times I^2\) unit = [J] \

- **Energia zavisi od druhej moocniny el. prudu** a *indukcnosti*
- energia sa premeni na teplo
